title: Implement Component Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for all UI components including usage examples, props, and styling guidelines

user_stories: As a developer, I need comprehensive component documentation so that I can use components correctly
As a designer, I want clear usage guidelines so that components are used consistently
business_rules: All components must have detailed documentation
Documentation must specify component props and events
Documentation must be easily accessible and searchable
edge_cases: Handling complex component configurations in documentation
Ensuring documentation stays up-to-date with component changes
Making documentation accessible to both technical and non-technical users

acceptance_criteria: All UI components have detailed documentation
Documentation specifies component props and events
Documentation is easily accessible and searchable
Documentation is integrated into the development workflow

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow documentation best practices for technical content. Ensure documentation is clear, concise, and comprehensive.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure documentation doesn't expose sensitive implementation details
